title: Pfizer Booster Shots Are Effective Against Omicron Variant, Israeli Study Says
sub_head: Findings also show those who had second Pfizer dose five months ago or more had little protection against the variant
body:
TEL AVIV—A booster shot of Pfizer Inc. and BioNTech SE ’s Covid-19 vaccine will provide good protection against severe illness from the Omicron variant, while those without a third shot are highly vulnerable, according to a new Israeli study.
The findings, similar to those announced last week by Pfizer, suggest countries worried about Omicron’s rapid spread will be able to defend their populations with continued inoculation.
